property.name: mapreduce.job.tracker.http.address
property.description: The job tracker http server address and port the server will listen on. If the port is 0 then the server will start on a free port.

property.name: mapreduce.cluster.acls.enabled
property.description: Specifies whether ACLs should be checked for authorization of users for doing various queue and job level operations. ACLs are disabled by default. If enabled, access control checks are made by JobTracker and TaskTracker when requests are made by users for queue operations like submit job to a queue and kill a job in the queue and job operations like viewing the job-details (See mapreduce.job.acl-view-job) or for modifying the job (See mapreduce.job.acl-modify-job) using Map/Reduce APIs, RPCs or via the console and web user interfaces.

property.name: mapreduce.jobtracker.taskScheduler
property.description: The class responsible for scheduling the tasks.
